謞字的基本解释

謞
hè
〔謞謞〕盛烈的样子。
谗慝。

謞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiào］
［《集韻》許教切，去效，曉。］
叫呼，大叫。
[②]［hè］
［《廣韻》呵各切，入鐸，曉。］
［《廣韻》許角切，入覺，曉。］
见“謞2謞”。

謞字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謞； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1176第03
【廣韻】許角切【集韻】【韻會】黑角切，?音翯。【爾雅·釋訓】謞謞，崇讒慝也。【註】樂禍助虐，增譖惡也。【疏】《詩·大雅》多將熇熇。鄭箋：多行熇熇，慘毒之惡。謞、熇音義同。　又人名。汝謞，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【廣韻】呵各切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】黑各切，?音郝。義同。　又【集韻】【類篇】?許敎切，音孝。與嗃同。大噑也。【管子·侈靡篇】?然若謞之靜。【註】雖有謞躁之人，亦皆恬靜。【春秋·繁露】古之聖人，謞而效天地謂之號，鳴而命施謂之名。　又【集韻】【正韻】?虛交切，孝平聲。與詨同。叫呼也。　又【莊子·齊物論】激者，謞者。【註】謞，去而聲疾也。

謞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
謞字的起名意思

暂无。

Gauntlet
hè
〔謞謞〕The vigorous look.
Slander.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiào］
["Ji Yun" Xu Jiaoqie, to effect, Xiao. ]
Scream, shout.
[②]［hè］
["Guangyun" He each cut, enter the duo, Xiao. ]
["Guang Yun" Xu Jiaoqie, enter into sleep, Xiao. ]
See "Foot 2 Foo".
Gauntlet
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謞; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1176 Page 03
[Guangyun] Xu Jiaoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Black angle cut,? Yinzhu. 【Erya·Shixun】Fang Fu, slanderous also. [Note] Pleasant misfortune helps abuse, increase slander and evil. [Sparse] "Poetry·Daya" is mostly invisible. Zheng Jian: Many lines of insults, brutal evil. The pronunciation and meaning are the same.　Another name. Ru Fu, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Guangyun] Oh, each cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Hei each cut,? Yin Hao. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Xu Diqie, Yinxiao. Same as 嗃. It's too big. [Guanzi·Luxury articles]? But it's quiet. [Note] Although there are irritable people, they are all quiet. [Chunqiu·Fanlu] The ancient saints feasted and imitated the name of the heaven and the earth, and called the name of the heaven and earth.　 [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Virtual intersecting, filial piety. Same as 詨. Call it too.　[Zhuangzi·Qiwulun] Exciter, sham. 【Note】Fang, the voice is sick when you go.
